    Reference

    All functions

    Bfiat-package Bfiat

    Bottom Fishing Impact Assessment Tools

    NIOZdata

    Biological data from a transect across the North sea for running the BFIAT tool.

    SAR

    Swept-area ratios in the Northsea, OSPAR data.

    critical_sar() critical_gpd() critical_r() critical_d()

    Critical values for fishing or taxon parameters.

    density_perturb() density_metier() density_logistic()

    Estimates density at specific times for the logistic and perturbation model. density_metier allows to specify different metiers.

    get_Db_model() get_irr_model()

    From model output (time x taxon density) to time x bioturbation or time x bioirrigation potentials.

    get_trait_model()

    Function to obtain (time x trait) data by combining model output (time x taxon) with trait (taxon x trait) data.

    sensitivity_taxon() sensitivity_area()

    Sensitivity of an area or taxon to fishing parameters

    steady_perturb() steady_metier() steady_logistic()

    Estimate steady-state density for logistic and perturbation model for one and more metiers.

    trawl_perturb() trawl_metier()

    Estimates density before and after a trawling event, or the average density between trawls.

    run_perturb() run_logistic()

    Functions to estimate the impact of bottom disturbances on benthic taxa. Allows for non-regularly spaced events.

    par_r() par_d() par_K() par_m()

    Estimate model parameters for use in the fishing impact model.

    Contents
